name: Stars & Foodies
description:
While this was for a class assignment, it's a relatively simple and short game where you organize food and stars into baskets. 

Side Notes:
- Since I made these builds from Unity on Windows PC, I'm not sure why the mac one wasn't working for me. So for y'all, the WebGL/embed should suffice
     - Which you might have to zoom out since the games resolution was 1920x1080

CREDITS:
- Visual assets were all drawn by me in CLIP STUDIO PAINT
     - Other (title text and button)  were from Unity

- Music by: HoobeZa (https://youtu.be/L_T0zQbfeWA)
